creator: Mist Games
descriptionHtml:
Straight from the depths of Dungeon, MuAwaY mobile has arrived! Become a medieval warrior, make new friends, demonstrate all your skills, conquer the Arenas and leave your mark in our history!
Choose one of our four available classes: Dark Wizard, Dark Knight, Fairy Elf or Magic Gladiator and fight against thousands of players online in this unique fantasy world! Collect items, evolve your character and conquer continents. Join this exciting adventure through the world of MuAwaY today!

MuAwaY is a medieval fantasy 3D MMORPG, available since 2007 for computers and now receives its mobile version with fully remade and optimized controls for any screen size of your smartphones.

▶ EVERYTHING ON THE PC, IS ALSO AVAILABLE ON MOBILE ◀
All systems have been remade and adapted for mobile, so you don't miss anything, such as: TRADE SYSTEM, GUILD, PARTY, PVP, EVENTS, and many others.

▶ REWARDING SYSTEM - BOX OF REWARD ◀
Evolve and earn the best items in the game for free by playing, through our master reset system, which will reward you with the Boxs of Reward, available in 4 editions.

▶ MODERN INTERFACE ◀
The interface has been completely redesigned, totally thought for you to enjoy the best gaming experience possible.

▶ BALANCED GAMEPLAY ◀
It's not because you're on the phone and your friend is on the computer that any of you will have a disadvantage. The mobile version is meant to be cross-platform balanced. In both PC and Mobile the only difference between victory and defeat will always be your HABILITY.

▶ SECURITY ◀
The exclusive security that MuAwaY already offers to our PC players will also be present in our mobile version.

▶ JOIN OUR EVENTS ◀
Choose which kind of event you like the most or are lucky with, we have daily mata-matas, pega-pegas, maratonas de guilds, maratonas de players, caça ao tesouro, esconde-esconde and many others.

▶ ENHANCEMENTS ARE COMING SOON ◀
And it doesn't stop there! Soon we will have a special communication system, with new features available for you to play on your phone.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
LOVE IS IN THE AIR AT MUAWAY

Changelog:
➡️ Added Earthshake skill for Horse's of War and White Horse;
➡️ Added miniature mode in the city on some mounts (Horse's of War and White Horse);
➡️ Adicionado montaria Horse of Ghost;
➡️ Added Valentine's Kit;
➡️ Added Apocalypse 2.0 Kit;
➡️ Defense/attack of Light Hawk items have been increased;
➡️ Fenrir skill cooldown reduced from 5s to 3s;

Valentine's Month coming to MuAwaY!

Contact us at support@muaway.net or our Discord channel: away.mu/discord

MuAwaY is a medieval fantasy 3D MMORPG, available since 2007 for computers and now receives its mobile version with fully remade and optimized controls for any screen size of your smartphones.

▶ EVERYTHING ON THE PC, IS ALSO AVAILABLE ON MOBILE ◀
All systems have been remade and adapted for mobile, so you don't miss anything, such as: TRADE SYSTEM, GUILD, PARTY, PVP, EVENTS, and many others.

▶ REWARDING SYSTEM - BOX OF REWARD ◀
Evolve and earn the best items in the game for free by playing, through our master reset system, which will reward you with the Boxs of Reward, available in 4 editions.

▶ MODERN INTERFACE ◀
The interface has been completely redesigned, totally thought for you to enjoy the best gaming experience possible.

▶ BALANCED GAMEPLAY ◀
It's not because you're on the phone and your friend is on the computer that any of you will have a disadvantage. The mobile version is meant to be cross-platform balanced. In both PC and Mobile the only difference between victory and defeat will always be your HABILITY.

▶ SECURITY ◀
The exclusive security that MuAwaY already offers to our PC players will also be present in our mobile version.

▶ JOIN OUR EVENTS ◀
Choose which kind of event you like the most or are lucky with, we have daily mata-matas, pega-pegas, maratonas de guilds, maratonas de players, caça ao tesouro, esconde-esconde and many others.

▶ ENHANCEMENTS ARE COMING SOON ◀
And it doesn't stop there! Soon we will have a special communication system, with new features available for you to play on your phone.

creator: Mist Games
descriptionHtml:
Straight from the depths of Dungeon, MuAwaY mobile has arrived! Become a medieval warrior, make new friends, demonstrate all your skills, conquer the Arenas and leave your mark in our history!
Choose one of our four available classes: Dark Wizard, Dark Knight, Fairy Elf or Magic Gladiator and fight against thousands of players online in this unique fantasy world! Collect items, evolve your character and conquer continents. Join this exciting adventure through the world of MuAwaY today!

MuAwaY is a medieval fantasy 3D MMORPG, available since 2007 for computers and now receives its mobile version with fully remade and optimized controls for any screen size of your smartphones.

▶ EVERYTHING ON THE PC, IS ALSO AVAILABLE ON MOBILE ◀
All systems have been remade and adapted for mobile, so you don't miss anything, such as: TRADE SYSTEM, GUILD, PARTY, PVP, EVENTS, and many others.

▶ REWARDING SYSTEM - BOX OF REWARD ◀
Evolve and earn the best items in the game for free by playing, through our master reset system, which will reward you with the Boxs of Reward, available in 4 editions.

▶ MODERN INTERFACE ◀
The interface has been completely redesigned, totally thought for you to enjoy the best gaming experience possible.

▶ BALANCED GAMEPLAY ◀
It's not because you're on the phone and your friend is on the computer that any of you will have a disadvantage. The mobile version is meant to be cross-platform balanced. In both PC and Mobile the only difference between victory and defeat will always be your HABILITY.

▶ SECURITY ◀
The exclusive security that MuAwaY already offers to our PC players will also be present in our mobile version.

▶ JOIN OUR EVENTS ◀
Choose which kind of event you like the most or are lucky with, we have daily mata-matas, pega-pegas, maratonas de guilds, maratonas de players, caça ao tesouro, esconde-esconde and many others.

▶ ENHANCEMENTS ARE COMING SOON ◀
And it doesn't stop there! Soon we will have a special communication system, with new features available for you to play on your phone.

Choose one of our four available classes: Dark Wizard, Dark Knight, Fairy Elf or Magic Gladiator and fight against thousands of players online in this unique fantasy world! Collect items, evolve your character and conquer continents. Join this exciting adventure through the world of MuAwaY today!

MuAwaY is a medieval fantasy 3D MMORPG, available since 2007 for computers and now receives its mobile version with fully remade and optimized controls for any screen size of your smartphones.

▶ EVERYTHING ON THE PC, IS ALSO AVAILABLE ON MOBILE ◀
All systems have been remade and adapted for mobile, so you don't miss anything, such as: TRADE SYSTEM, GUILD, PARTY, PVP, EVENTS, and many others.

▶ REWARDING SYSTEM - BOX OF REWARD ◀
Evolve and earn the best items in the game for free by playing, through our master reset system, which will reward you with the Boxs of Reward, available in 4 editions.

▶ MODERN INTERFACE ◀
The interface has been completely redesigned, totally thought for you to enjoy the best gaming experience possible.

▶ BALANCED GAMEPLAY ◀
It's not because you're on the phone and your friend is on the computer that any of you will have a disadvantage. The mobile version is meant to be cross-platform balanced. In both PC and Mobile the only difference between victory and defeat will always be your HABILITY.

▶ SECURITY ◀
The exclusive security that MuAwaY already offers to our PC players will also be present in our mobile version.

▶ JOIN OUR EVENTS ◀
Choose which kind of event you like the most or are lucky with, we have daily mata-matas, pega-pegas, maratonas de guilds, maratonas de players, caça ao tesouro, esconde-esconde and many others.

▶ ENHANCEMENTS ARE COMING SOON ◀
And it doesn't stop there! Soon we will have a special communication system, with new features available for you to play on your phone.

title: MuAwaY

creator: Mist Games
descriptionHtml:
Straight from the depths of Dungeon, MuAwaY mobile has arrived! Become a medieval warrior, make new friends, demonstrate all your skills, conquer the Arenas and leave your mark in our history!
Choose one of our four available classes: Dark Wizard, Dark Knight, Fairy Elf or Magic Gladiator and fight against thousands of players online in this unique fantasy world! Collect items, evolve your character and conquer continents. Join this exciting adventure through the world of MuAwaY today!

MuAwaY is a medieval fantasy 3D MMORPG, available since 2007 for computers and now receives its mobile version with fully remade and optimized controls for any screen size of your smartphones.

▶ EVERYTHING ON THE PC, IS ALSO AVAILABLE ON MOBILE ◀
All systems have been remade and adapted for mobile, so you don't miss anything, such as: TRADE SYSTEM, GUILD, PARTY, PVP, EVENTS, and many others.

▶ REWARDING SYSTEM - BOX OF REWARD ◀
Evolve and earn the best items in the game for free by playing, through our master reset system, which will reward you with the Boxs of Reward, available in 4 editions.

▶ MODERN INTERFACE ◀
The interface has been completely redesigned, totally thought for you to enjoy the best gaming experience possible.

▶ BALANCED GAMEPLAY ◀
It's not because you're on the phone and your friend is on the computer that any of you will have a disadvantage. The mobile version is meant to be cross-platform balanced. In both PC and Mobile the only difference between victory and defeat will always be your HABILITY.

▶ SECURITY ◀
The exclusive security that MuAwaY already offers to our PC players will also be present in our mobile version.

▶ JOIN OUR EVENTS ◀
Choose which kind of event you like the most or are lucky with, we have daily mata-matas, pega-pegas, maratonas de guilds, maratonas de players, caça ao tesouro, esconde-esconde and many others.

▶ ENHANCEMENTS ARE COMING SOON ◀
And it doesn't stop there! Soon we will have a special communication system, with new features available for you to play on your phone.
